title: Game than never ended
body:
I dont really know how to explain it but after I won a game with some friends the stats never popped up and then i skipped them and now its saying reconnect over almost an hour after the game was originally finished, the rest of my team has the same issue too and we dont know what to do or fix it because we cant leave the screen. 
 help soon please

replies.body: This looks like what we refer to as a *Ghost Game*. This happens when the game server doesn't properly report the game has been recorded and finished to the matchmaking server. At *maximum* it shouldn't last more than a few hours. Please let me know if you're still seeing this issue.
